page.title: 08THE FEAST
page.content: AT THE FEAST IN 1984 THERE WERE MANY PEOPLE.SOME MEN WERE SELLING GOLDFISH.THERE WERE WOMEN SELLING HOT DOGS(SAUSAGE IN BREAD ROLLS).THERE WERE COCONUT SHIES.THAT IS WHERE THERE IS A ROW OF COCONUTS AND YOU HAVE TO TRY TO KNOCK ONE DOWN WITH A BALL.THERE WERE ALSO TWO HOOK A DUCK STALLS.THAT IS WHERE YOU HAVE A LONG STICK WITH A HOOK ON THE END AND YOU HAVE TO HOOK A PLASTIC DUCK USING THE STICK. LONG ASO WORKERS HAD A DAY OFF WORK AND THE CHILDREN HAD A WEEK OFF SCHOOL.FRIDAY WAS A FREE DAY AT THE FEAST AS A TRIAL DAY.IT OPENED AT 2PM ON SATURDAY AND CLOSED AT 11PM.THERE WAS A FOOTBALL MATCH IN THE SECOND FIELD ON SATURDAY AND TUESDAY.FAMILY PARTIES TOOK PLACE.STUFFED CHINE WAS THE MAIN DISH.
